metadata.title: DEPRECATED: ELSA-2012-0481 -- kernel security, bug fix, and enhancement update (moderate)
metadata.description:
[2.6.32-220.13.1.el6] - Revert: [fs] NFSv4: include bitmap in nfsv4 get acl data (Sachin Prabhu) [753231 753232] {CVE-2011-4131}
